document.docAuthor: William G. R. Crampton & James S. Albert
document.masterDocTitle: Redescription of Gymnotus coropinae (Gymnotiformes, Gymnotidae), an often misidentified species of Neotropical electric fish, with notes on natural history and electric signals.
